column4: I am rather annoyed.  I use Ubuntu so that I can have a Linux Operating System to use.  However I could have fixed this problem by reformatting and installing ubuntu again by now.  The only thing that is stopping me are my remaining files on Unbuntu.
there are grub docs available online so you don't have to ask such questions...they are in apt-get
this way if you are busy reading the millions of documentations pages...you won't have to take anyone's time to ask any questions.
absolutely....that is why RTM is changed to RTFM....note the word fuckedup
